info.title: Liferay Admin Sites Headless API

get.description: Retrieves a specific display page template folder of a site.

x-codeSamples.label: sdk
Liferay.Util.fetch

additionalName.description: The user's additional name, which can be used as a middle name.

image.description: A relative URL to the user's profile image.

name.description: The user's full name.

profileURL.description: A relative URL to the user's profile.

Creator.description: The utility page's creator. It is not returned by default. It can be embedded via nestedFields.

creatorExternalReferenceCode.description: The display page template folder's creator external reference code.

dateCreated.description: The display page template folder's creation date.

dateModified.description: The last time any field of the display page template folder was changed.

description.description: The display page template folder's description.

externalReferenceCode.description: The display page template folder's external reference code.

key.description: The display page template folder's key.

name.description: The display page template folder's name.

parentDisplayPageTemplateFolderExternalR.description: The parent display page template folder's external reference code.

uuid.description: A valid external identifier to reference this page template folder.

DisplayPageTemplateFolder.description: The display page template's parent folder.

ClassNameReference.description: A reference specifying the class name.

ClassSubtypeReference.description: A reference specifying the class name and an optional subtype.

additionalProperties.description: The configuration keys and values of the client extension.

clientExtensionConfig.description: The configuration keys and values of the client extension.

externalReferenceCode.description: The client extension's external reference code.

ClientExtension.description: The client extension for the theme spritemap of a page specification.

collectionItemConfig.description: The collection item page element's configuration.

collectionViewports.description: A list of viewports of the collection page element.

displayAllItems.description: Whether to show all items when pagination is disabled.

displayAllPages.description: Whether to show all pages when pagination is enabled.

fragmentViewports.description: The fragment viewports of the collection page element.

listItemStyle.description: The style of a list of items in the collection page element.

listStyle.description: The style of a list in the collection page element.

name.description: The custom name of a collection page element.

numberOfColumns.description: The number of columns in the collection page element.

numberOfItems.description: The maximum number of items to display in the collection page element when pagination is disabled.

numberOfItemsPerPage.description: The number of items per page in the collection page element.

numberOfPages.description: The maximum number of pages to show when pagination is enabled.

templateKey.description: The collection page element's template key.

numberOfColumns.description: The number of columns of the collection viewport.

CollectionViewportDefinition.description: The definition of the collection viewport.

columnViewports.description: A list of column viewports of the column page element.

landscapeMobile.description: The landscape mobile configuration of the fragment image.

portraitMobile.description: The portrait mobile configuration of the fragment image.

tablet.description: The tablet configuration of the fragment image.

Config.description: Represents the Adaptive Media fragment image configuration for different viewports.

contentVisibility.description: The content visibility of the container.

cssClasses.description: A list of CSS Classes that are applied to the element.

items.description: A list of CSS Classes that are applied to the element.

customCSS.description: Custom CSS that is applied on the container page element.

customCSSViewports.description: The custom CSS viewports of the container page element.

fragmentViewports.description: A list of fragment viewports of the container page element.

indexed.description: A flag that indicates whether the container page element is indexed or not.

name.description: The custom name of a container page element.

draftContentPageSpecificationExternalRef.description: The draft content page specification external reference code or null if it is a draft content page specification.

customCSS.description: The definition of the custom CSS viewport.

creatorExternalReferenceCode.description: The display page template's creator external reference code.

dateCreated.description: The display page template's creation date.

dateModified.description: The last time any field of the display page template was changed.

datePublished.description: The display page template's most recent publication date.

externalReferenceCode.description: The display page template's external reference code.

additionalProperties.description: The localized relative URLs to the display page template's rendered content.

friendlyUrlPath_i18n.description: The localized relative URLs to the display page template's rendered content.

markedAsDefault.description: Whether the display page template is the default one for the given content type/subtype.

name.description: The display page template's name.

pageSpecifications.description: The display page template's specifications. A display page template will contain 1 page specifications for its draft layout and 1 page specifications for its published layout. This field is not returned by default. It can be requested via nestedFields.

uuid.description: A valid external identifier to reference this display page template.

DisplayPageTemplateSettings.description: Settings of the display page template, such as SEO or OpenGraph.

fragmentSettings.description: The drop zone page element's allowed or unallowed fragments.

displayMessage.description: Whether to display a message when the collection is empty or no results match the applied filters (true by default).

additionalProperties.description: The localized message to display when the collection is empty or no results match the applied filters ('No Results Found' by default).

message_i18n.description: The localized message to display when the collection is empty or no results match the applied filters ('No Results Found' by default).

numberOfSteps.description: The form page element's number of steps.

successFormSubmissionResult.description: The definition of the result when a form submission is successful.

cssClasses.description: A list of CSS classes that are applied to the form page element.

items.description: A list of CSS classes that are applied to the form page element.

customCSS.description: Custom CSS that is applied on the form page element.

customCSSViewports.description: The custom CSS viewports of the page form.

fragmentViewports.description: A list of fragment viewports of a form page element.

indexed.description: A flag that indicates whether the page fragment instance is indexed or not.

name.description: The custom name of a form page element.

cssClasses.description: A list of CSS classes that are applied to the form step container page element.

items.description: A list of CSS classes that are applied to the form step container page element.

customCSS.description: Custom CSS that is applied on the form step container page element.

customCSSViewports.description: The custom CSS viewports of the form step container page element.

fragmentViewports.description: A list of fragment viewports of a form step container page element.

name.description: The custom name of a form step container page element.

fragmentDropZoneId.description: The id of the fragment drop zone

FragmentField.description: The fragment field values of the the fragment instance.

url.description: The fragment image's url. Can be inline or mapped to an external value.

FragmentImage.description: The background fragment image of the container page element.

cssClasses.description: A list of CSS classes that are applied to the fragment instance.

items.description: A list of CSS classes that are applied to the fragment instance.

customCSS.description: Custom CSS that is applied on the fragment instance.

customCSSViewports.description: The custom CSS viewports of the fragment instance.

datePropagated.description: The fragment instance's most recent propagation date.

datePublished.description: The fragment instance's most recent publication date.

draftPageElementExternalReferenceCode.description: The external reference code of the corresponding page element in the draft of the page. Available only in the published page specification.

additionalProperties.description: The configuration values of the fragment instance.

fragmentConfig.description: The configuration values of the fragment instance.

fragmentFields.description: The fragment field values of the the fragment instance.

fragmentReference.description: An external reference to the fragment.

fragmentViewports.description: A list of fragment viewports of the fragment instance page element.

indexed.description: A flag that indicates whether the fragment instance page element is indexed or not.

name.description: The custom name of a fragment instance page element.

namespace.description: The fragment instance page element's namespace.

uuid.description: A valid external identifier to reference this fragment instance page element.

widgetInstances.description: A list of widget instances within the fragment instance page element.

FragmentLink.description: The fragment link of the container page element.

href.description: The fragment link value's hypertext reference. Can be an inline value or mapped to an external value.

target.description: The fragment link value's target (blank, parent, self, top).

hidden.description: Specifies if the fragment is hidden to the user.

FragmentStyle.description: The fragment style of the widget instance page element.

hidden.description: Specifies if the fragment's viewport is hidden to the user.

friendlyUrlPath_i18n.description: The old localized relative URLs to the page's rendered content.

FriendlyUrlHistory.description: The history of previously used URLs to the utility page's rendered content. This field is not returned by default. It can be requested via nestedFields.

ItemExternalReference.description: A unique reference to an entity which remains constant across environments.

Layout.description: The form step container page element's layout.

additionalProperties.description: The localized Open Graph's descriptions.
The localized Open Graph's image alts.

imageAlt_i18n.description: The localized Open Graph's image alts.

additionalProperties.description: The localized Open Graph's titles.

externalReferenceCode.description: The page element's external reference code. Unique within the site.

pageElements.description: A list of the page elements this page element has.

parentExternalReferenceCode.description: The parent's page element's external reference code. Unique within the site.

position.description: The 0-based position this page element occupies with respect to its siblings (0 for first child, 1 for second child, ...). If not specified when creating a page element the page element will be added at the last valid position.

PageElement.description: The page elements in the experience.

type.description: The page element definition's type (collection, collection item, column, container, drop zone, form, form step, form step container, fragment, fragment composition, fragment drop zone, row or widget).

externalReferenceCode.description: The experience's external reference code, unique per site.

additionalProperties.description: The localized experience's names.

pageElements.description: The page elements in the experience.

pageRules.description: The page rules in the experience.

pageSpecificationExternalReferenceCode.description: The page specification's external reference code.

priority.description: the experience's priority. It must be a unique value within the page specification. The default experience will always be assigned priority 0. A priority higher than 0 will result in an experience being active and a priority lower than 0 will result in an experience being inactive.

externalReferenceCode.description: The page rule external reference code.

name.description: The custom name of a page rule.

pageRuleActions.description: A list of actions of a page rule.

pageRuleConditions.description: A list of conditions of a page rule.

conditionType.description: The custom name of a Page rule.

PageRule.description: The page rules in the experience.

externalReferenceCode.description: The page rule action's external reference code.

itemId.description: The page rule action's item ID.

PageRuleAction.description: A list of actions of a page rule.

externalReferenceCode.description: The page rule condition's external reference code.

PageRuleCondition.description: A list of conditions of a page rule.

externalReferenceCode.description: The page specification's external reference code, unique per site.

status.description: The status of the page specification.

type.description: The type of the page specification.

PageSpecification.description: The utility page's specifications. A utility page will contain 1 page specifications for its draft layout and 1 page specifications for its published layout. This field is not returned by default. It can be requested via nestedFields.

cssClasses.description: A list of CSS classes that are applied to the row page element.

items.description: A list of CSS classes that are applied to the row page element.

customCSS.description: Custom CSS that is applied on the row page element.

customCSSViewports.description: The custom CSS viewports of the row page element.

fragmentViewports.description: A list of fragment viewports of a row page element.

gutters.description: A flag that indicates whether the row page element has gutters.

indexed.description: A flag that indicates whether the row page element is indexed or not.

modulesPerRow.description: The row page element's modules per row.

name.description: The custom name of a row page element.

numberOfColumns.description: The row page element's number of columns.

reverseOrder.description: A flag that indicates whether the row page element has reverse order.

rowViewports.description: A list of viewports of the row page element.

verticalAlignment.description: The vertical alignment property of the row page element.

modulesPerRow.description: The number of modules per row.

position.description: The 0-based position this widget instance occupies with respect to its siblings (0 for first child, 1 for second child, ...). If not specified when creating a widget instance the widget instance will be added at the last valid position.
